note: Dr. De La Cruz is a Double-certified plastic surgeon who is a world-renowned expert in High-definition VASER liposuction and Brazilian Butt lift. He received numerous awards such as the St. Jude Children's Research Hospital "Helping Hands Award"; the "We Are One" Humanitarian award from Stockholm, Sweden; and a congressional recognition for his humanitarian efforts by the United States Congress. He recently received a prestos award by Dr. Alfredo Hoyos of Colombia for the Best high-Definition.
